text: Andrew P. Buckley Jr. (born February 13, 1965) is an American actor, screenwriter, and stockbroker. He is best known for his role as David Wallace on the American comedy series The Office from 2006 to 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Screenwriters from Massachusetts Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles
title: Andy Buckley
